DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study compare change body weight in-person behavioral weight loss program , technology-based system , enhanced version technology-based system 6 month behavioral weight loss intervention obese adult . Additional aim compare change body composition , physical activity , dietary intake , frequency self-monitoring weight loss behavior 3 group . A total 84 sedentary , healthy obese adult ( BMI : 35.0-45.0 kg/m2 ) age 21-55 recruited participate . Assessments conduct 0 , 3 , 6 month include measurement height , weight , body composition , blood pressure , physical activity , dietary intake , eat behavior . This randomize control trial participant randomize completion assessment one three group : standard behavioral weight loss ( SBWL ) , BodyMedia® FIT System ( FIT ) , BodyMedia® FIT System Bluetooth® enhancement ( FIT-BT ) . Subjects SBWL participate behavioral weight loss intervention include weekly group session throughout 6 month program . FIT FIT-BT attend weekly group session , identical intervention material mail week . FIT receive BodyMedia® FIT System , FIT-BT receive BodyMedia® FIT System Bluetooth® enhancement use throughout 6 month program . FIT FIT-BT receive telephone intervention call 1x per month .
